about_the_game:
Welcome to Underworld Overseer, the ultimate dungeon management experience in virtual reality!

Take on the role of a powerful Overseer tasked with building and managing your own sinister underground lair. Channel your inner evil genius as you design intricate dungeons, attract a variety of monstrous minions, set traps and cast spells to defend your domain against waves of adventurers.

Build your own dungeon

Command your imps to dig tunnels and build chambers, enticing creatures with various needs and abilities to inhabit your dungeon. Your strategic planning is crucial to maintain their productivity and happiness while ensuring the security of your underground stronghold.

Place strategic traps to trap the unwary

Shape the dangers of your domain where every move springs your traps: spikes, poison, and flames, all engineered to defeat intruders.

Use powerful spells to destroy your enemies

Master an arsenal devastating spells to seize victory like Fireball, Chain Lightning or even the Raise Skeleton incantation, raising an army of loyal skeletal minions to vanquish your foes.

Ascend to the top and overcome engaging trials

Embark on a journey through 18 uniquely designed levels, each demanding approximately 20-25 minutes of strategic gameplay. Prepare to outmaneuver your adversaries and overcome diverse challenges, requiring unconventional tactics and sharp decision-making skills to claim victory.

Are you ready to embrace the darkness and rule over your own underworld kingdom?

name: Underworld Overseer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR - Meta Quest 2/3/3s or equivalent
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 or superior
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060, AMD Radeon RX 480 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR - Meta Quest 2/3/3s or equivalent

reviews:
“Underworld Overseer is the Dungeon Keeper spiritual sequel I've been waiting for. Get that classic PC strategy game feel from a brand new perspective. Featuring cutting-edge visuals and the best micromanaging yet in any VR strategy game, you'll be building the dungeons of your dreams in no time.”
Android Central

“The cel-shaded visuals look great on Quest 3 for both NPCs and environments, even when you move up close. What I've seen so far looks very promising, and I'll be keeping an eye out for the full release.”
UploadVR
short_description: Become the master of your dungeon, command your army of demons, expand your territory, place strategic traps and defeat waves of adventurers with your powerful spells.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Danish, Spanish - Latin America, Hungarian, Japanese, Norwegian, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
